data.eml:eml: Notes on the bee genus Alloscirtetica Holmberg, 1909 in northern Chile with the description of two new altiplanic species and a key for the Chilean species of Eucerini (Hymenoptera: Apidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vivallo, Felipe (2009): Notes on the bee genus Alloscirtetica Holmberg, 1909 in northern Chile with the description of two new altiplanic species and a key for the Chilean species of Eucerini (Hymenoptera: Apidae). Zootaxa 2010: 16-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185792
